00003  * __COPYRIGHT__ GT

00006 #include <math.h>
00007 #define COMPONENT_NAME "pathneural"
00008 
00009 #ifdef BPRED_PARSE_ARGS
00010 if(!strcasecmp(COMPONENT_NAME,type))
00011 {
00012   int l1_size;
00013   int his_width;
00014   int top_size;
00015 
00016   if(sscanf(opt_string,"%*[^:]:%[^:]:%d:%d:%d",name,&l1_size,&his_width,&top_size) != 4)
00017     fatal("bad bpred options string %s (should be \"pathneural:name:l1_size:his_width:top_size\")",opt_string);
00018   return new bpred_pathneural_t(name,l1_size,his_width,top_size);
00019 }
00020 #else
00021 
00022 class bpred_pathneural_t:public bpred_dir_t
00023 {
00024 #define BIPOLAR(x) (((x)<<1)-1)
00025 //#define BIPOLAR(x) (2*(x)-1)
00026 
00027 #define MAX_PATHNEURAL_PATH 128
00028 
00029   class bpred_pathneural_sc_t:public bpred_sc_t
00030   {
00031     public:
00032     qword_t * bhr;
00033     qword_t lookup_bhr;
00034     md_addr_t lookup_path[MAX_PATHNEURAL_PATH];
00035     md_addr_t lookup_PC;
00036     int sum;
00037   };
00038 
00039   protected:
00040 
00041   int bht_size;
00042   int bht_mask;
00043   qword_t * bht;
00044   int top_size;
00045   int top_mask;
00046   short **top; /* table of pathneurals */
00047   int weight_width;
00048   int weight_max;
00049   int weight_min;
00050   int theta;
00051 
00052   md_addr_t path[MAX_PATHNEURAL_PATH];
00053   int path_head;
00054 
00055   counter_t weights_read;
00056   counter_t weights_written;
00057 
00058   int history_length;
00059   qword_t history_mask;
00060 
00061   public:
00062 
00063   /* CREATE */
00064   bpred_pathneural_t(char * const arg_name,
00065                      const int arg_bht_size,
00066                      const int arg_history_length,
00067                      const int arg_top_size
00068                     )
00069   {
00070     init();
00071 
00072     /* verify arguments are valid */
00073     CHECK_PPOW2(arg_bht_size);
00074     CHECK_NNEG(arg_history_length);
00075 
00076     name = strdup(arg_name);
00077     if(!name)
00078       fatal("couldn't malloc pathneural name (strdup)");
00079     type = strdup(COMPONENT_NAME);
00080     if(!type)
00081       fatal("couldn't malloc pathneural type (strdup)");
00082 
00083     bht_size = arg_bht_size;
00084     bht_mask = arg_bht_size-1;
00085     history_length = arg_history_length;
00086     history_mask = (((qword_t)1)<<arg_history_length)-1;
00087 
00088     top_size = arg_top_size;
00089     top_mask = (1<<(int)(rint(ceil(log(arg_top_size)/log(2.0)))))-1;
00090 
00091     /* see Dan Jimenez's HPCA paper for these magic formulae */
00092     theta = (int) rint(floor(1.93*arg_history_length + 14.0));
00093 
00094     /* if power of two, then actually need an extra bit to represent.
00095        also add one bit for the sign. */
00096     //if(theta == (1<<mylog2(theta)))
00097       //weight_width = mylog2(theta)+2;
00098     //else
00099       //weight_width = mylog2(theta)+1;
00100     weight_width = 8;
00101 
00102     weight_max = (1<<(weight_width-1))-1;
00103     weight_min = -(1<<(weight_width-1));
00104 
00105     bht = (qword_t*) calloc(bht_size,sizeof(*bht));
00106     if(!bht)
00107       fatal("couldn't malloc pathneural BHT");
00108     top = (short**) calloc(top_size,sizeof(*top));
00109     if(!top)
00110       fatal("couldn't malloc pathneural ToP");
00111     for(int i=0;i<top_size;i++)
00112     {
00113       top[i] = (short*) calloc(1+history_length,sizeof(*top[i]));
00114       if(!top[i])
00115         fatal("couldn't malloc pathneural ToP entry");
00116     }
00117 
00118     memset(path,0,sizeof(*path)*MAX_PATHNEURAL_PATH);
00119     path_head = 0;
00120 
00121     weights_read = 0;
00122     weights_written = 0;
00123 
00124     bits =  bht_size*history_length
00125          + top_size*(history_length+1)*weight_width
00126          + history_length*log_base2(top_size);
00127   }
00128 
00129   /* DESTROY */
00130   ~bpred_pathneural_t()
00131   {
00132     for(int i=0;i<top_size;i++)
00133     {
00134       free(top[i]); top[i] = NULL;
00135     }
00136     free(top); top = NULL;
00137     free(bht); bht = NULL;
00138   }
00139 
00140   BPRED_LOOKUP_HEADER
00141   {
00142     class bpred_pathneural_sc_t * sc = (class bpred_pathneural_sc_t*) scvp;
00143     int l1index = PC&bht_mask;
00144     bool pred;
00145     int i;
00146 
00147     sc->bhr = &bht[l1index];
00148     sc->sum = top[(PC&top_mask)%top_size][0];
00149     for(i=0;i<history_length;i++)
00150     {
00151       int hist_dir = ((*sc->bhr >> i) & 1) ? 1:-1;
00152       md_addr_t addr = path[(path_head - i + MAX_PATHNEURAL_PATH) % MAX_PATHNEURAL_PATH];
00153       sc->sum += hist_dir * top[(addr&top_mask)%top_size][i+1];
00154     }
00155 
00156     pred = (sc->sum >= 0);
00157     sc->lookup_PC = PC;
00158     sc->lookup_bhr = *sc->bhr;
00159     for(i=0;i<history_length;i++)
00160     {
00161       sc->lookup_path[history_length-i-1] = path[(path_head - i + MAX_PATHNEURAL_PATH)%MAX_PATHNEURAL_PATH];
00162     }
00163 
00164     weights_read += 1 + history_length;
00165 
00166     BPRED_STAT(lookups++;)
00167     sc->updated = false;
00168 
00169     return pred;
00170   }
00171 
00172   /* UPDATE */
00173   BPRED_UPDATE_HEADER
00174   {
00175     class bpred_pathneural_sc_t * sc = (class bpred_pathneural_sc_t*) scvp;
00176 
00177     if(!sc->updated)
00178     {
00179       BPRED_STAT(updates++;)
00180       BPRED_STAT(num_hits += our_pred == outcome;)
00181       sc->updated = true;
00182     }
00183 
00184     if(((sc->sum >= 0) != outcome) || ((sc->sum > -theta) && (sc->sum <theta)))
00185     {
00186       short * weight;
00187       weight = &top[(PC&top_mask)%top_size][0];
00188       if(outcome) {
00189           if(*weight < weight_max) ++*weight;
00190       } else {
00191           if(*weight > weight_min) --*weight;
00192       }
00193 
00194       for(int i=0;i<history_length;i++)
00195       {
00196         md_addr_t addr = sc->lookup_path[history_length-1-i];
00197         weight = &top[(addr&top_mask)%top_size][i+1];
00198         if( ((sc->lookup_bhr>>i)&1) == (unsigned)outcome ) {
00199             if(*weight < weight_max) ++*weight;
00200         } else {
00201             if(*weight > weight_min) --*weight;
00202         }
00203       }
00204       weights_written += 1 + history_length;
00205     }
00206 
00207   }
00208 
00209   /* SPEC_UPDATE */
00210   BPRED_SPEC_UPDATE_HEADER
00211   {
00212     class bpred_pathneural_sc_t * sc = (class bpred_pathneural_sc_t*) scvp;
00213     BPRED_STAT(spec_updates++;)
00214 
00215     *sc->bhr = ((*sc->bhr<<1)|outcome)&history_mask;
00216     path_head = modinc(path_head,MAX_PATHNEURAL_PATH); //(path_head + 1) % MAX_PATHNEURAL_PATH;
00217     path[path_head] = PC;
00218   }
00219 
00220   /* RECOVER */
00221   BPRED_RECOVER_HEADER
00222   {
00223     class bpred_pathneural_sc_t * sc = (class bpred_pathneural_sc_t*) scvp;
00224     *sc->bhr = (sc->lookup_bhr<<1)|outcome;
00225     for(int i=0;i<history_length;i++)
00226         path[i] = sc->lookup_path[i];
00227     path_head = history_length-1;
00228 
00229     path_head = modinc(path_head,MAX_PATHNEURAL_PATH); //(path_head + 1) % MAX_PATHNEURAL_PATH;
00230     path[path_head] = sc->lookup_PC;
00231   }
00232 
00233   /* FLUSH */
00234   BPRED_FLUSH_HEADER
00235   {
00236     class bpred_pathneural_sc_t * sc = (class bpred_pathneural_sc_t*) scvp;
00237     *sc->bhr = sc->lookup_bhr;
00238     for(int i=0;i<history_length;i++)
00239       path[i] = sc->lookup_path[i];
00240     path_head = history_length-1;
00241   }
00242 
00243   /* REG_STATS */
00244   BPRED_REG_STATS_HEADER
00245   {
00246     bpred_dir_t::reg_stats(sdb,core);
00247 
00248     int id = core?core->current_thread->id:0;
00249     char buf[256];
00250     char buf2[256];
00251 
00252     sprintf(buf,"c%d.%s.threshold",id,name);
00253     sprintf(buf2,"%s training threshold",type);
00254     stat_reg_int(sdb, true, buf, buf2, &theta, theta, NULL);
00255     sprintf(buf,"c%d.%s.weight_width",id,name);
00256     sprintf(buf2,"%s weight/counter width in bits",type);
00257     stat_reg_int(sdb, true, buf, buf2, &weight_width, weight_width, NULL);
00258     sprintf(buf,"c%d.%s.weights_read",id,name);
00259     sprintf(buf2,"total number of weights read by %s",name);
00260     stat_reg_counter(sdb, true, buf, buf2, &weights_read, weights_read, NULL);
00261     sprintf(buf,"c%d.%s.weights_written",id,name);
00262     sprintf(buf2,"total number of weights written by %s",name);
00263     stat_reg_counter(sdb, true, buf, buf2, &weights_written, weights_written, NULL);
00264   }
00265 
00266   /* GET_CACHE */
00267   BPRED_GET_CACHE_HEADER
00268   {
00269     class bpred_pathneural_sc_t * sc = new bpred_pathneural_sc_t();
00270     if(!sc)
00271       fatal("couldn't malloc pathneural State Cache");
00272     return sc;
00273   }
00274 
00275 };
